about_the_game:
SHOOT'EM UP!


Jezebel: Givin' Love a Shot is an old-school horizontal shoot 'em up, heavily inspired by the arcade classics of the 90's!

GIVIN' LOVE A SHOT!


You are Jezebel, a young and powerful witch. One day, she decides to take the advice of her cat Vincent to go on a journey in pursuit of the only thing missing in her life: love.

To help Jezebel, Vincent made her a profile on a dating app – and she even got some matches already! Now all she has to do is to choose who she wants to meet, pick a nice place and go on a date!

But this is not a romance game, remember? This is a shoot 'em up. So expect lots of monsters and challenges between you and your date. Can you take Jezebel safe and sound to meet the boy of her dreams?

CLASSIC ARCADE EXPERIENCE!


– Old school Neo Geo and Capcom's CPS-2 style 2D graphics;
– Play through 7 stages on Story Mode or Arcade Mode with a diverse roster of enemies and bosses, always presenting different and exciting challenges;
– Get potions to upgrade your shots for extra damage or to create a magic barrier to protect you from enemies;
– Collect gemstones to fill your power meter and waste your enemies with a SUPER SHOT.

SHOOT'EM UP!


Jezebel: Givin' Love a Shot is an old-school horizontal shoot 'em up, heavily inspired by the arcade classics of the 90's!

GIVIN' LOVE A SHOT!


You are Jezebel, a young and powerful witch. One day, she decides to take the advice of her cat Vincent to go on a journey in pursuit of the only thing missing in her life: love.

To help Jezebel, Vincent made her a profile on a dating app – and she even got some matches already! Now all she has to do is to choose who she wants to meet, pick a nice place and go on a date!

But this is not a romance game, remember? This is a shoot 'em up. So expect lots of monsters and challenges between you and your date. Can you take Jezebel safe and sound to meet the boy of her dreams?

CLASSIC ARCADE EXPERIENCE!


– Old school Neo Geo and Capcom's CPS-2 style 2D graphics;

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio

short_description: An old-school horizontal shoot 'em up, heavily inspired by the arcade classics of the 90's!
